item.title: Between the Lions
item.description: This is a TV show that was introducewd on PBS in year 2000 with the aim of teaching children reading comprehension skill. It is targeted at kids who are beginning to read. Books are read on air during the program. This is also likey to be more appealing to the youngest readers (4 and 5 year olds) This program should be coupled with reading with the kids.

item.title: IXL
item.description: Take Aways IXL lists skills that cover writing and composition. These skills are organized by grade, and one can just move your mouse over any skill name to preview the skill. To start practising, just click on any link. IXL will track your score, and the questions will automatically increase in difficulty as users improve.

item.title: Kids Love Writing
item.description: Take Aways Website Program uses technology, media, and video to give children an engaging & confident experience for writing. They help student create their own books! Students need help wwhen they struggle with writing and programs like this help mitigate the relucatnce with writing.

item.title: OxfordOWL
item.description: Pre-reading and beginning reading help for Pre-K to K readers through the pre-teen years. From phonics lessons to online books to story videos read by professional story tellers, this site offers comprehensive reading help and activities for educators and parents. Activities are included alongside e-books. Activities built to encourage reading. Books are linked to other similar books making discovery of new books easy.

item.title: PBS Reading
item.description: Take Aways PBS reading is an educational and entertainment site full of games, videos, and quests featuring kids' favorite PBS television show characters. Kids who are learning basic skills and already know many of the characters featured here from popular PBS shows such as Sesame Street and Curious George will enjoy playing games with their television friends. Parents are advised to sit next to kids and helping them learn safe and fun online skills.

item.title: Read Write Think
item.description: Take Aways Reading through interactive practice. Activities provide a preview of the story line and related activities. Comic creator is a highlight of the site and helps children create comics. Students have to drag and drop their avatars, backgrounds and speech bubbles to create a story.
